sources.title: Escape from Sahara (1958) Action, Adventure, War | Full length movie
sources.description:
Ex-mercenaries fleeing to their home countries with a love twist.

aka Madeleine und der Legionär
Director: Wolfgang Staudte
Writer: Emil Burri, Werner Jörg Lüddecke, Johannes Mario Simmel
Stars: Hildegard Knef, Bernhard Wicki, Hannes Messemer

CCC CHAPTERS: in the general comments, tell us your favorite scene or line in the movie, with a time stamp & we will add it here!
00:00 Full Length Movie
17:21 War is war
18:14 Deserted in the desert
20:50 Wanted!
41:02 Afraid 
59:23 Do not disturb

metadata.Plot: Deserters from French Foreign Legion and a teacher escaping from war in the Sahara...
metadata.Writer: Emil Burri, Werner Jörg Lüddecke, Johannes Mario Simmel
metadata.Actors: Hildegard Knef, Bernhard Wicki, Hannes Messemer
